column4: general question; is there some amount of memory you keep free for smooth operation.  E.g. I am using 800 MB of ram right now and I have 2.5 gigs total.  I was thinking about going all the way to 4 just to be safe
for "normal" desktop stuff it should be good
I do development with tools like Eclipse.  250 MB right now for eclipse
the linux kernel "pre wires" lots of ram so if it is only using 800 it is fine - when you see yourself swapping then buy more ram
